Was broken by YARN-4439.  I think it would make more sense to address it on the original JIRA since it just went in.  Could simply revert and re-commit the correct patch, making a subsequent cherry-pick to the 2.6 line easier if desired.
Thanks [~jlowe]! yes, It makes sense, which will make cherry-pick easier.
